title: FS: 2 MJ ROOP t206 storage boxes! - SOLD!
author: jimivintage

posts.post_title: FS: 2 MJ ROOP t206 storage boxes! - SOLD!
posts.post_content:
I am not chasing the monster right now as my HOF Collection has really taken off....so these have to go!


**First to yell, "MINE!" gets it!


Sorry, but I only own one of the keys.
Buy one with the key for $57.50 shipped
Buy the one without the key for $50 shipped.
Or buy both for $100 shipped and the key works in both boxes.  :)  Both boxes are very nice!

(No, the two t206 HOFers in the pic do not come with it!)  :)

Jimi
Mine.  I will take them both.  PM sent.
